mapper.select:
WITH TOTALCOUNTVIEW AS ( SELECT A.RCRT_NO, COUNT(APL_NO) TOTALCOUNT FROM RECRUIT A LEFT OUTER JOIN APPLY B ON A.RCRT_NO=B.RCRT_NO GROUP BY A.RCRT_NO )
, CURRPROCEDUREVIEW AS( SELECT RCRT_NO, RPROC_ORDER CURRPROCEDURE, RPROC_END FROM V_CURRPROCEDURE )
, CHECKEDVIEW AS ( SELECT V.RCRT_NO, COUNT(*) CHECKED FROM V_CURRPROCEDURE V LEFT OUTER JOIN A_PROCEDURE AP ON AP.RCRT_NO=V.RCRT_NO WHERE AP.RPROC_ORDER = V.RPROC_ORDER AND APROC_PASS IS NOT NULL GROUP BY V.RCRT_NO, V.RPROC_ORDER )
, UNCHECKEDVIEW AS ( SELECT V.RCRT_NO, COUNT(*) UNCHECKED FROM V_CURRPROCEDURE V LEFT OUTER JOIN A_PROCEDURE AP ON AP.RCRT_NO=V.RCRT_NO WHERE AP.RPROC_ORDER = V.RPROC_ORDER AND APROC_PASS IS NULL GROUP BY V.RCRT_NO, V.RPROC_ORDER )
, FINALPASSVIEW AS ( SELECT F.RCRT_NO, COUNT(APL_NO) FINALPASS FROM ( SELECT A.RCRT_NO, A.FINALORDER, B.RPROC_END FROM ( SELECT A.RCRT_NO, MAX(RPROC_ORDER) FINALORDER FROM RECRUIT A LEFT OUTER JOIN R_PROCEDURE B ON A.RCRT_NO = B.RCRT_NO GROUP BY A.RCRT_NO ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT RCRT_NO, RPROC_ORDER, RPROC_END FROM R_PROCEDURE ) B ON A.RCRT_NO=B.RCRT_NO AND A.FINALORDER=B.RPROC_ORDER WHERE RPROC_END = 'Y' ) F LEFT OUTER JOIN A_PROCEDURE AP ON F.RCRT_NO=AP.RCRT_NO AND FINALORDER=RPROC_ORDER WHERE AP.APROC_PASS='Y' GROUP BY F.RCRT_NO ) SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT A.RCRT_NO "rcrtNo"
,COMPANY_ID "companyId" ,RCRT_TITLE "rcrtTitle" ,RCRT_HIT "rcrtHit" ,RCRT_KEYWORDNM "rcrtKeywordnm" ,RCRT_FIELD "rcrtField" ,RCRT_PERSON "rcrtPerson" ,RCRT_CAREER "rcrtCareer" ,RCRT_CONDITION "rcrtCondition" ,RCRT_EDU "rcrtEdu" ,RCRT_LOC "rcrtLoc" ,RCRT_TYPE "rcrtType" ,RCRT_SALARY "rcrtSalary" ,RCRT_WEEK "rcrtWeek" ,TO_CHAR(RCRT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "rcrtDate" ,TO_CHAR(RCRT_SDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "rcrtSdate" ,TO_CHAR(RCRT_EDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "rcrtEdate" ,RCRT_NM "rcrtNm" ,RCRT_TEL "rcrtTel" ,RCRT_MAIL "rcrtMail" ,RCRT_WLFR "rcrtWlfr" ,RCRT_RECTYPE "rcrtRectype" ,RCRT_STIME "rcrtStime" ,RCRT_ETIME "rcrtEtime" ,RCRT_DELETE "rcrtDelete" , TOTALCOUNT "totalCount" , CURRPROCEDURE "currprocedure" , CHECKED "checked" , UNCHECKED "unchecked" , FINALPASS "finalpass" FROM recruit A LEFT OUTER JOIN TOTALCOUNTVIEW B ON (A.RCRT_NO=B.RCRT_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN CURRPROCEDUREVIEW C ON (A.RCRT_NO=C.RCRT_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN CHECKEDVIEW D ON (A.RCRT_NO=D.RCRT_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN UNCHECKEDVIEW E ON (A.RCRT_NO=E.RCRT_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN FINALPASSVIEW F ON (A.RCRT_NO=F.RCRT_NO)
ORDER BY RCRT_EDATE DESC
ORDER BY RCRT_DATE DESC
) A ) B
WHERE RNUM>=#{startRow} AND RNUM<=#{endRow}

SELECT RCRT_NO , RPROC_ORDER , RPROC_TYPENO , RPROC_SDATE , RPROC_EDATE , RPROC_END , TEST_NO , COM_CODE_NM FROM R_PROCEDURE LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_COM_CODE ON RPROC_TYPENO=COM_CODE WHERE RCRT_NO=#{rcrtNo} ORDER BY RPROC_ORDER ASC

SELECT RCRT_NO , RPROC_ORDER , RPROC_TYPENO , RPROC_SDATE , RPROC_EDATE , RPROC_END , TEST_NO , COM_CODE_NM FROM R_PROCEDURE LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_COM_CODE ON RPROC_TYPENO=COM_CODE WHERE RCRT_NO=#{rcrtNo} AND RPROC_ORDER=#{rprocOrder}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM A_PROCEDURE AP LEFT OUTER JOIN V_APPLICANTINFO B ON AP.APL_NO=B.APL_NO

WITH INTRINFOVIEW AS( SELECT I.INTR_NO , APL_NO , INTR_INTDATE , INTR_PLACE , COM_CODE_NM "INTRTYPENM" , INTR_DATE , COUNT(CASE WHEN I_ALARM_TYPE='Z01' THEN 1 END) MAILCOUNT , COUNT(CASE WHEN I_ALARM_TYPE='Z02' THEN 1 END) ALARMCOUNT FROM INTERVIEW_SCHD I LEFT OUTER JOIN INTERVIEW_ALARM IA ON I.INTR_NO=IA.INTR_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_COM_CODE ON INTR_TYPE=COM_CODE GROUP BY I.INTR_NO , APL_NO , INTR_INTDATE , INTR_PLACE , INTR_DATE , COM_CODE_NM ) SELECT COUNT(*) FROM a_procedure AP LEFT OUTER JOIN V_APPLICANTINFO B ON AP.APL_NO=B.APL_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN INTRINFOVIEW I ON AP.APL_NO=I.APL_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER ON USERS_ID=MEM_ID
AND INTR_DATE is NOT NULL
AND INTR_DATE is NULL

WITH INTRINFOVIEW AS( SELECT I.INTR_NO , APL_NO , INTR_INTDATE , INTR_PLACE , INTR_TYPE , COM_CODE_NM "INTRTYPENM" , INTR_DATE , COUNT(CASE WHEN I_ALARM_TYPE='Z01' THEN 1 END) MAILCOUNT , COUNT(CASE WHEN I_ALARM_TYPE='Z02' THEN 1 END) ALARMCOUNT FROM INTERVIEW_SCHD I LEFT OUTER JOIN INTERVIEW_ALARM IA ON I.INTR_NO=IA.INTR_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_COM_CODE ON INTR_TYPE=COM_CODE GROUP BY I.INTR_NO , APL_NO , INTR_INTDATE , INTR_PLACE , INTR_DATE , COM_CODE_NM , INTR_TYPE ) ,RESATTVIEW AS( SELECT APL_NO, A.RESATT_NO FROM APPLY A INNER JOIN RESUME_ATTATCH R ON A.RESATT_NO=R.RESATT_NO ) SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, RN.* FROM ( SELECT AP.apl_no , AP.rcrt_no , AP.rproc_order , TO_CHAR(APROC_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "aprocDate" , aproc_pass , aproc_scr , USERS_ID , USERS_NM , MEM_MAIL , TO_CHAR(USERS_BIR, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "usersBir" , USERS_GEN , TO_CHAR(INTR_INTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "intrIntdate" , INTR_NO , INTR_PLACE , INTR_TYPE , INTRTYPENM "intrTypeNm" , TO_CHAR(INTR_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "intrDate" , NVL(MAILCOUNT,0) "mailCount" , NVL(ALARMCOUNT,0) "alarmCount" , RESATT_NO FROM a_procedure AP LEFT OUTER JOIN V_APPLICANTINFO B ON AP.APL_NO=B.APL_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN INTRINFOVIEW I ON AP.APL_NO=I.APL_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER ON USERS_ID=MEM_ID INNER JOIN RESATTVIEW R ON AP.APL_NO=R.APL_NO
AND INTR_DATE is NOT NULL
AND INTR_DATE is NULL
ORDER BY APROC_DATE DESC
ORDER BY INTR_INTDATE DESC
) RN ) T
WHERE RNUM>=#{startRow} AND RNUM<=#{endRow}
mapper.update: UPDATE R_PROCEDURE SET RPROC_END = 'Y' WHERE RCRT_NO=#{rcrtNo} AND RPROC_ORDER=#{rprocOrder}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESUME_FORM WHERE RCRT_NO = #{rcrtNo} AND RPROC_ORDER = #{rprocOrder}
SELECT COMPANY_ID, COMPANY_NUM, COMPANY_FILE, COMPANY_DNM, COMPANY_NM, COMPANY_DATE, COMPANY_PERMISSION FROM COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_ID=#{companyId}

SELECT RCRT_NO, COMPANY_ID, RCRT_TITLE, RCRT_HIT, RCRT_KEYWORDNM, RCRT_FIELD, RCRT_PERSON, RCRT_CAREER, RCRT_CONDITION, RCRT_EDU, RCRT_LOC, RCRT_TYPE, RCRT_SALARY, RCRT_WEEK, TO_CHAR(RCRT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "rcrtDate", TO_CHAR(RCRT_SDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "rcrtSdate", TO_CHAR(RCRT_EDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "rcrtEdate", RCRT_NM, RCRT_TEL, RCRT_MAIL, RCRT_WLFR, RCRT_RECTYPE, RCRT_STIME, RCRT_ETIME, RCRT_DELETE FROM RECRUIT WHERE RCRT_NO = #{rcrtNo}
SELECT MEM_MAIL FROM a_procedure AP LEFT OUTER JOIN V_APPLICANTINFO B ON AP.APL_NO=B.APL_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER ON USERS_ID=MEM_ID WHERE RCRT_NO = #{rcrtNo} AND RPROC_ORDER = #{rprocOrder}

SELECT USERS_NM , TO_CHAR(USERS_BIR, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "usersBir" , case when USERS_GEN='F' then '여' else '남' end "usersGen" , TO_CHAR(APROC_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "aprocDate" , case when aproc_pass='Y' then '합격' when aproc_pass='N' then '불합격' else '미확인' end "aprocPass" , AP.apl_no , AP.rcrt_no , AP.rproc_order , case when rproc_end='N' then '진행중' else '마감' end "rprocEnd" FROM a_procedure AP LEFT OUTER JOIN V_APPLICANTINFO B ON AP.APL_NO=B.APL_NO inner join r_procedure RP on AP.rcrt_no=RP.rcrt_no and AP.rproc_order=RP.rproc_order WHERE AP.RCRT_NO=#{rcrtNo} AND AP.RPROC_ORDER=#{rprocOrder}
AND APROC_PASS='Y'
AND APROC_PASS='N'
AND APROC_PASS IS NULL
ORDER BY APROC_DATE ASC
